plot: Two Albanian brothers migrate to Greece and try, each in his own way, to integrate into their host country by following two different lifestyles.
title: Agon
plot_es: Two Albanian brothers migrate to Greece and try, each in his own way, to integrate into their host country by following two different lifestyles.
plot_en: Two Albanian brothers migrate to Greece and try, each in his own way, to integrate into their host country by following two different lifestyles.
